heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_medusa
heroes.bio_loc: Beauty is power. This thought comforted Medusa--the youngest and loveliest of three beautiful Gorgon sisters, born to a sea goddess--because she alone of the sisters was mortal. It comforted her, that is, until the day masked assailants invaded the Gorgon realm and tore the two immortal sisters from their home, unmoved by their beauty or by their tears. One of the invaders seized Medusa as well, but then cast her aside with a disgusted look: 'This one has the mortal stink upon her. We have no use for that which dies.' Humiliated, enraged, Medusa fled to the temple of her mother and cast herself before the goddess, crying, 'You denied me eternal life--therefore I beg you, give me power! Power, so I can dedicate what life I have to rescuing my sisters and avenging this injustice!' After long thought, the goddess granted her daughter's request, allowing Medusa to trade her legendary beauty for a face and form of terrifying strength. Never for a moment has Medusa regretted her choice. She understands that power is the only beauty worth possessing--for only power can change the world.
heroes.hype_loc: Constant attack is the key to Medusa's success. Using her mana shield to stave off assault, she employs split shots to mow down waves of enemies. Once she gathers her full strength, she becomes a force powerful enough to stop anyone in their tracks.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Immobilizes her enemies with her stone gaze

facets.description_loc: Mystic Snake grants Medusa attack damage.
facets.name: medusa_engorged

facets.description_loc: Medusa can gain attack speed at the cost of mana over time.
facets.name: medusa_mana_pact

abilities.name: medusa_split_shot
abilities.desc_loc:
Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.

The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike).
abilities.lore_loc: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.
notes_loc: Secondary targets will be the closest enemy units excluding the primary target.
If illusions of Medusa are created while Split Shot is active, they will also have this ability.

abilities.name: medusa_mystic_snake
abilities.desc_loc: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage. Damage and speed increases with each jump. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake returns a percentage of the targets' total mana.
abilities.lore_loc: The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.
abilities.scepter_loc: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.
facets_loc: Mystic Snakes returning to Medusa empower her next %max_attacks% attacks with +1 additional damage for each %mana_per_damage% mana restored. Lasts up to %attack_buff_duration%s.

abilities.name: medusa_mana_shield
abilities.desc_loc: Creates a shield that absorbs %absorption_pct%%% of incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana. Illusions absorb less damage per point of mana.
abilities.lore_loc: While Medusa was not gifted with eternal life upon birth, her curse bestowed her with impressive defensive powers.
notes_loc: Absorbs damage before any damage reduction takes place, meaning that armor will not reduce the amount of mana needed to absorb damage.
facets_loc: Mana Shield can be activated, draining %aspd_increase_mana_cost_pct%%% of max mana per second to gain %aspd_increase_rate_pct%%% attack speed bonus per second, up to %aspd_increase_max_tooltip%%%. Maximum effect reached after %aspd_increase_max_aspd_time%s. Buff lasts %aspd_increase_buff_duration%s and Cooldown is %attack_buff_cooldown%s.

abilities.name: medusa_cold_blooded
abilities.desc_loc: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy.

abilities.name: medusa_stone_gaze
abilities.desc_loc: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If %face_duration% seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical attack damage.
abilities.lore_loc: The beauty of Medusa is legendary.
notes_loc: Regardless of when a unit receives the Stone Gaze buff while the ability is active on Medusa, it will still receive the full debuff duration.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_medusa
talents.desc_loc: The duration of the stun is not affected.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_medusa_4
talents.desc_loc: Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot.
